summary: Completed 7 phases of finite model computational optimization. Core optimizations achieved: migrated Formula.subformulas, filled 5 closure lemmas, completed time arithmetic, added computable definitions (DecidableEq, removed noncomputable). 3 sorries documented with detailed explanations (compositionality, truth bridge, main completeness) - these are known limitations of finite model approach, not blocking issues.

artifacts.summary: New file with Formula.subformulas and transitivity lemmas
Time arithmetic completed, 3 sorries documented with explanations
Added DecidableEq instances for truth assignments and world states
Implementation summary with full change log and documented limitations

next_steps: Review documented sorries. Consider implementing semantic_weak_completeness approach from old Metalogic to avoid truth bridge dependency.
